alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 8:02PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Ada, west central Boise, Payette, Canyon, northwestern Owyhee, Gem, southern Washington, south central Baker and northeastern Malheur Counties through 900 PM MDT/800 PM PDT/... At 801 PM MDT/701 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong winds in advance of weakening thunderstorms along a line extending from near Farewell Bend State Park to near Notus to near Sheaville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Caldwell, Notus, Greenleaf and New Plymouth around 810 PM MDT. Nampa, Payette, Middleton and Letha around 820 PM MDT. Emmett, Weiser, Reynolds and Star around 830 PM MDT. Eagle, Garden City,Boise, Mann Creek Reservoir and Presley Bridge around 840 PM MDT. Murphy, Sweet, Melba and Star Butte around 850 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
